name: David Ramirez
text: I already risked change two or three times over my life, depending on how one looks at things, but then, I've had a safety net in not needing to worry too much about material concerns.    Philosophically , it doesn't matter, because everything is illusory and transitory. Materially, it's about whether other people are depending on you for their welfare. If one has no dependents, it's not a big deal to gamble one's life on the possibility of something more. It's a different equation when there are kids/family members, etc.
